results.title: All our futures
results.creator_credit: Harold Mantell and Harold Mantell Inc
results.brief_description: Narrated by Peter Ustinov this film shows the 25 years of service to children by UNICEF. Beginning in 12 European countries where five million children were given food, medicine and clothing during the emergency period after World War II, and then moving - over the years and to many different places - to show its diversified work in many more countries including Africa and Latin America.
results.description: Narrated by Peter Ustinov this film shows the 25 years of service to children by UNICEF. results.title: All my own work
results.brief_description: An in-service education film for teachers. Aims to show how the new approaches in Art Education can be successfully applied to the classroom. The emphasis is on painting, while the new course is child-centered.

results.title: All my own bush
results.brief_description: A Secondary School student takes a movie camera to the bushland around Monbulk and is suddenly aware of man’s intrusion into the bush. Suitable for mid-upper Primary School.

results.title: All men are liars
results.creator_credit: Gerard Lee, John Maynard and Arena Films
results.brief_description: In an attempt to reunite his family, which has fallen apart over a hocked piano, sensitive 17 year old Mick O’Brien joins the all girl “Total Fire Band” to earn some extra cash. He falls in love with the lead singer Angela whos been jilted by one too many lying men. She’s hot for Mick too, but not because hes cute and talented, but being a woman he’s sure to be honest! Great performances from Toni Pearen and especially John Jarrat as the has-been Elvis impersonator adds to the hilarity of this left-of-centre comedy.

results.title: All manner of trains
results.brief_description: The capacity, scope, problems and future of Australia’s six State and one Commonwealth railway systems. We accompany a railway worker from Cairns to Perth, by rail, and then visit workshops to see carriages and locomotives being made, and modern methods of mechanised track laying. Specially designed rolling stock is used for stock transport, bulk wheat and sugar moving, transporting cars and semi-trailers, and for moving timber. No other credits available.

results.title: All lit up
results.creator_credit: Joy Batchelor, John Halas and Gas Council
results.brief_description: An exhilarating presentation of the story of the use of fire for warmth and comfort since the days of the Romans. Shows something of the inherent problems that have persisted until today; with the use of an ingenious yet simple invention, the major difficulties have been solved.

results.title: All is well on the border front
results.creator_credit: Akram Zaatari, Lebanon Theater and Future Television
results.brief_description: A tribute to Godard’s seminal “Ici et Ailleurs” (Here and Elsewhere), video artist Akram Zaatari’s documentary, like its predecessor, critically explores issues of representation within the occupied zone of South Lebanon. Interviews with Lebanese prisoners in Israel illustrate aspects of life under occupation with convincing poignancy. In Arabic with English subtitles.
